title: World of Warcraft Font "The Burning Crusade" logo
content:

Also - what font is the “WORLD” written in? Thanks :)

— David

No sure but “World” could be [Bembo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025050515/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=bembo&site=d) with a little variation in the R and at the top of the W where the serifs touch.
